trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关的设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: ConnectionsZoneDesigner provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionsZoneDesigner 提供的设计时表示形式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>菜单以访问与控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>属性页开发人员的便利性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 它是唯一的区域设计器不支持设计器区域。

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 这是因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件使用链接来创建而不是拖放用户界面 (UI) 的连接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>这两项出现的谓词菜单的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>当选中时，可让你选择的配色方案。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>复选框，选中，将显示控件的内容，它将在浏览器中出现; 控件将为空，直到建立连接。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from ConnectionsZoneDesigner to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以从 ConnectionsZoneDesigner 以支持自定义继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制与其他控件的设计器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，以更改呈现控件的标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>集合，以便添加<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>具有自定义方案。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合的预定义自动格式设置方案中显示**自动套用格式**关联控件设计时的对话框。

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: Autoformat 属性重写其基实现来获取预定义的集合，特定于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: A predefined <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: 预定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref>具有默认 ConnectionZone 方案。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是用于在设计时表示控件的标记。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 将设计器绑定到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref>的设计器关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时隐藏一组预设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: PreFilterProperties 方法重写父方法，以便隐藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>设计器中的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为问题的属性不会呈现通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控件，并因此不相关。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>组与控件关联的属性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
